A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It tried to do too much. It was not able to give the appropriate attention to certain events or moments. On top of that\, most of those events/moments were ruined by terrible\, confusing writing. The movie also continued its annoying one liners that appear too often and in the wrong way. This movie made me appreciate J.J. Abrams a lot.\n\nAlso\, for some reason there is like 3 or 4 new Force abilities that just happen. New force abilities are cool but not when someone who rarely utilizes the Force just flies through space...
